title: Filtered
text: Seems like I don‚Äôt get features to properly filter content.  Some videos seem like they don‚Äôt take into account people‚Äôs health problems.  Might be better if we all had proper healthcare to reduce some of this.  Some of this might be helpful to increase diversity, though it also opens up being routed to content that can be used to annoy or worse.  It can actually have the reverse effect for some which is sad.  Supporting LGBT people is different than having it constantly funneled into your stream. title: ‚ÄúHow can we make the experience more frustrating this time‚Äù
text:
Every single time this app updates it‚Äôs just lowered in quality. You liked where comments were? Yeah we moved them. You liked the app not crashing? Sorry. You liked a functioning recommended feed? That‚Äôs gone too. 
But don‚Äôt worry about the actual problems like pornographic advertisements littering every comments section. Or the fact that the ads are allowed to curse as much as they want, but if a content creator does this they‚Äôre demonetized. There‚Äôs literally an ad going around right now that says ‚ÄúIf you want to lose weight, stop eating.‚Äù I‚Äôm sure that won‚Äôt damage any young psyches. Hopefully a decent competitor site rises soon, so that they can see how many people only use this site because of the creators the continue to put down.

title: App freezes
text: I enjoy the experience of being able to watch videos well on my new iPhone, however, there is one drawback that persists to agonize me. This happens to me only when I have the video in landscape. When I pause the video for some time, the app itself will freeze the phone, whereas I must click my power button to make it sleep. I have to press after a certain amount of time after turning off the screen in order for it to pop back up to the way it was. This especially happened when a video ended and autoplay is set to on. I don‚Äôt know if it continues when it is off, but it is an annoying bug for me. Just earlier, my phone crashed entirely because of it. Please find a solution, thank you.

title: Trash December update
text: Loved watching this on my fire stick up until recently. The new layout takes 5x the button clicks, most things are hidden off the main page, you have to search and search and search again. Playlists I haven‚Äôt seen in 12 years are automatically on top? When I click into one, maybe this isn‚Äôt a problem for mobile, but for a tv, it takes 10 times longer to get to a video I want to see with this list layout (used to be a grid where you could access 5 different videos with one arrow). Also the playlist is on auto play if you linger?? What are you, Netflix? You literally took the WORST feature of Netflix and applied it to an already functioning app. Honestly if I can find a competitor with my videos I‚Äôm switching. This is a bad experience.

title: Super Buggy on iOS
text:
App the last 3-6 months (Oct 2023) has been very buggy on iOS 16.7.
Audio gets out of sync if you pause and come back to the video you were playing. Sometimes the video is black & only audio plays (when you pause or exit then come back to the same video).
 The Scrubbing touch area on iPad /iph is very hard to hit. When you try to scrub, it just moves the whole window like you‚Äôre closing the app. Pls fix this target area for scrubbing. It‚Äôs been awful a long time. 
AirPlay 2 drops (on Sonos)  if you don‚Äôt play continuously. If you pause for a few minutes (like to answer the door etc), you come back and have to add the AirPlay speaker again, then the audio is out of sync. I can‚Äôt be the only one experiencing THIS FOR MONTHS AND MONTHS. 
So many Ads!! Worse than commercial TV. Target buttons for settings (gear icon) also small. Takes several taps to hit it.
Lastly the WATCH LATER PLAYLIST REFUSES TO REFRESH after you add videos. You have to hit it like 4 times before the most recent videos show up in the playlist.  Very annoying. You have a lot of iOS viewers, and to make the YT experience awful won‚Äôt get us to buy a pixel phone.

title: Too many ads and no way to turn off shorts
text:
Theres too many advertisements, you get like 20 seconds of ads every like 5 minutes, or before every video. Sometimes, there are more add than there is video length. Along with that, sometimes when using not super good wifi or cellular, it starts buffering an ad which causes the video player to pause, waiting for the 15 second mountain dew ad to load, even though there is still more of the actual video buffered.
Along with that, there isn't any way to disable shorts, so if you misclick, you go to a shorts video.
One last thing is that if you go fullscreen on a vertical advertisement before the video itself, it will keep the full screen player in portrait mode, even if the video is in landscape, which makes the player tiny and means you have to exit and reenter fullscreen mode in order to fix it.

title: Overall good but one thing
text: When ever I want to rewatch something I haven‚Äôt watched in couple days in my history I end seeing multiple of the same exact video just from different days and it‚Äôs honestly annoying because if I delete one of them they all get deleted and then I have spend 10 minutes looking for the video I wanted to watch from the person who made channel and it‚Äôs getting on my nerves so pleas make the history list the way it used to be one video of what ever videos you watch and not multiple of the same video just with freakin date from when you watch, because I have three videos in a row from when I watched a video at different times of week and it‚Äôs just takes up space, I don‚Äôt who decided that was a good idea but it‚Äôs not so please fix it. Thank you

title: Video Author is Able to Override Accessibility Settings
text: This has been a problem for ages and it‚Äôs more irritating on the app. It makes NO sense that you can only adjust subtitle settings on the specific video you‚Äôre watching and if you have the bad luck to watch a video where the absolutely unhinged creator has decided that everyone would love to see headache-inducing pink subtitles in a impossible to read script font it will override your settings and you ONCE AGAIN will have to meticulously go in and reset them. Subtitles are an ACCESSIBILITY FEATURE if a user has specific settings to make using the site/app more accessible they should be allowed to set it ONCE under settings. This is just such an insane choice and I cannot fathom why it hasn‚Äôt been changed. The iPhone already allows users to customise caption style but this stupid app chooses to not support that either.

title: I Love The Wide Range Of Topics And Videos, But Crashes Too Often
text: Is My Default Entertainment App, But It‚Äôs Frustrating When You Can Not Try To Save Several Videos One After The Other Or Shared Them, Before It Will Soon Crashes And You‚Äôll Loose The Important Videos That You Wanted To Make Sure To Saved Or Share, With Someone, In The First Place, Because Once You Touch One Video You Want To See, It Then Changes To The New List Of Videos, And If You Go Back Sometimes You Can See The One‚Äôs You Wanted Again, But Most Of The Time, You Will Not. That‚Äôs On The iPad And iPhone App As Well, No Matter If You Deleted And Reinstalled And/Or If You Reset The Device As New And Start Over, It‚Äôs This App That Has That Problem. But I Love The Wide Range Of Topics And Videos. And Like I Said, It‚Äôs My Default Entertainment App.

title: Great platform but awful moderation
text: I watch mostly nutrition, video games, baseball, and exercise videos and this app has the biggest and best library of content on the internet in my opinion. The moderation scares me at time. There is a surprisingly high amount of animal abuse, human abuse, scams, and general distasteful content and ads. Some of the ads I have seen are for legitimate Porn. I understand that the internet is for all kinds of content, but all of those are strictly against YouTube‚Äôs guidelines. Moderation spends more time taking down videos based on copyright and less time taking down videos of animals being skinned alive. It concerns me greatly. It‚Äôs not hard to avoid that sort of content, but I think it‚Äôs only right to bring it to your attention the kind of stuff that is flying under the radar in this app.

title: Shady Practices
text: For approximately the past year I‚Äôve noticed that Google seems to aggressively shove their chrome app and google search app down my throat. Very frequently when I click a link in a video description I will not be given the option to open the link into safari, the default iOS web browser. I will only be given the option to either download the Google Chrome app or the Google Search app. Sometimes, even, the option to open the link in safari will appear instead of the option to download Google Search but when I click to open in safari, I‚Äôm instead taken to the Google Search app download page. I‚Äôm sick of often having to click a link multiple times or even relaunch the application just to open a link in safari instead of other google products. I don‚Äôt want chrome, I don‚Äôt want google search, I just want to open a link in safari.

title: Search bar problems
text: So I‚Äôm having problems with the search bar every time I‚Äôm trying to scroll through what I have searched up already it keeps sending that search bar to the top of the screen and only allow me to see one line search that I‚Äôve looked up I‚Äôve already talk to a support person and they told me to leave a feedback on the app so the engineers can come check it out but I‚Äôm currently having this problem on my iPhone. Also I have uninstalled the app reinstalled it I have power down my phone and powered it back on and nothing seems to fix the problem also the app is up-to-date

title: Screen Sharing
text:
I love the convenience of this app, however I have a huge problem when you can‚Äôt turn off the screen sharing. I turned it off on my IPad‚Äôs general settings, but the developers of this app still managed to make it impossible to turn it off on this app. No one wants an icon at the top of their screen and top of their video that if accidentally pushed,  it will broadcast what you‚Äôre watching onto your family‚Äôs tv screen. To be frank with you, watching RuPaul‚Äôs drag race and broadcasting it to your conservative family‚Äôs tv isn‚Äôt ideal (lol). 

A suggestion to the developers:  Create an option in the YouTube‚Äôs app privacy settings that allows us to turn off the screen sharing icon. 

Thanks for reviewing this in advance.

title: Google chrome issue
text: The feature to connect to google chrome is excellent.  However I have had issues often with losing control with the video being cast to my TV.   Somehow the phone app and the video being cast seem to not be together.  In other words it happened yesterday and I had a video playing.   I tried to stop and load another video.  The current video continued to play but the phone app did what I asked and went to the new video.   The video being cast continued to be played and also then played the next video in line without regard to what was happening on the phone.   From that point on the TV cast was running on its own regardless of what I did to regain control.  Even with the app being closed the TV videos continued.   This has happened on multiple instances.

title: A lot unchecked
text: Firstly, I‚Äôll say that I don‚Äôt mind sitting through ads. I get things cost money, but if we‚Äôre going to push deepfake Ai impersonation scams as ads as a way to get people to buy premium, then that‚Äôs where I start to draw the line. There are so many other things you can do to make a bigger appeal towards premium. A currency system for streams like twitch, channel customization options, premium emojis, custom templates and badges and whatnot for streamers and creators like streamlabs‚Äîthose are all things that I‚Äôd HAPPILY pay $15/mo for and I‚Äôm sure others would too! Another gripe is the TOS and report system. I get positions are hard to fill but come on. I reported a video of a person LITERALLY admitting to and justifying their attraction to minors and was told that the video didn‚Äôt violate the TOS. An admission like that is ILLEGAL yet it doesn‚Äôt violate the TOS?

title: This App and Company are Infuriating

title: CONSTANTLY having app issues
text:
On top of the issues I already have with this app constantly, now auto play stays on and I can‚Äôt leave comments on any videos. I already have issues with the Shorts algorithm over correcting, the comment field jumping as I type, and not getting notifications for certain channels. But now I can barely enjoy using the app. 

There is a mental health reason why I cannot allow auto play, and because you don‚Äôt allow users to control what kind of content they see in ads (your Google settings need so much work, seriously), I am now forced to hear things that could potentially spend me into a negative spiral just so you can force ads I do not want on me. OR a video plays that I did not want to see and your awful, inefficient algorithm immediately begins to recommend me related videos that I purposely try to avoid. FIX THIS.

title: Dislike button is gone for good.
text: As of Nov 11, 2021, the dislike function that was used to rate videos for over ten years (more specifically, since Apr 1, 2010) is officially gone. So no more will you ever voice your own concerns or opinions on certain videos. Ever since YT has been more focused on manufactured, soulless propaganda from the likes of giant corporations and Hollywood celebs, and with bigger content creators also doing the exact same thing by manipulating their core audiences by shoehorning in identity politics without any knowledge or research whatsoever (the same thing corporations and celebs are also doing), the site has jeopardized any future would-be content creators to build and create amateurish, yet creative products. Almost seventeen years in and YT has continued to go down the drain. Speaking from myself whose been on the platform since Sept 2006, I am not amused by this otherwise awful news.

title: unnecessary layout changes
text: I have been using the iPad version of this app for as long as I remember and in recent months before the 1.29 update, I really liked the way the videos on the home page were laid out (3-wide rows), and organized by topics such as video games, sewing, etc. However, past version 1.29 the videos are only 2 per row, which means huge thumbnails that take up half the screen, and feel like are more optimized for phones. This looks extremely loud and cluttered on larger screens, like the bigger models of the iPad Pro. Also, videos are no longer organized by topic and are all lumped together in an endless scroll. This makes it extremely disorienting to find the specific content I‚Äôd like to watch. I like the app, but abhor this new layout. Please bring back the old one.

title: Joined YT in 2007, and now THIS?!?
text:
So I have been an active (daily) user on YT since 2007! I don‚Äôt have any strikes on my channel at all, not for copyright or for community. ZERO! I have set my channel settings to ‚Äúnot made for kids‚Äù because my content is NOT targeted to children and doesn‚Äôt have any children in them. 
Now, all of a sudden, I don‚Äôt have comments! And I mean the entire comment section is gone! On my own videos, on ANY video I click on...it‚Äôs just gone!
But if I log on to my wife‚Äôs channel, she has comments! If I log out of my channel, there‚Äôs comments!  
I‚Äôve tried everything I can think of over the last few days with this issue. Signed out and back in, gone over all settings in YT Studio, everything. 
13 years of being active on YT and I don‚Äôt even get an explanation as to WHY they did this to my channel. Really sad because one would think that active users are important. Seems that isn‚Äôt the case.

title: Judging the App not the Platform
text: While the platform has several problems, I‚Äôm here to judge the app itself. There are still bugs like how pressing the ‚Äúnot interested‚Äù button puts that video on my history despite not watching it as well as a video I want to watch getting overlaid by an entirely different video which creates two or three audios playing over one video. So please fix that. Also, an introduction of personal playlists in a simple menu for videos/music I want to watch/listen to would be a nice addition. Yes there are playlists but I want it to be simpler and more cleaned up rather than a long row of random playlists from both personal videos on my channel and videos I watch at night or while working.

title: Payment Method
text:
UTube Video payment method on Apple smartphone needs tweaking to allow personal credit card changes so that payments can be made on time. Due to this technical limitation, I am unable to make a payment at the present time. An address or telephone number to make a payment would suffice if this option can not be resolved. 

I am very satisfied with the range of topics from a broad spectrum of authors and speakers from somewhat earlier and more contemporary historical culture. The quality of service is excellent in so far as being able to access and share the videos with individuals who may also enjoy viewing them.

title: Developer response requested
text: I‚Äôm asking here because YouTube/Google is simply impossible to work with. Skip forward/back function is buggy. I have it set to 10 seconds. My understanding is that if you double click on the left side of the screen, it is suppose to rewind the video 10 seconds. If you triple click, 20 seconds. Quadruple click, 30 seconds, and go on from there. Am I right? My experience ever since updating the app has been random. Sometimes the double click works as intended, sometimes it does nothing, sometimes it goes back 20 seconds, or 30 seconds, even though I have only double clicked. Sometimes it will go to the very beginning of the video, or section of the video. My finger is nowhere near the bottom of the screen and very clearly in the middle. No other part of my hands are touching the screen. Thoughts? Thanks!

title: Getting worse and worse
text:
I have been using this app for a long time now and there are some things that have been added that I‚Äôm not a fan of and bug fixes that I have found recently.

With the recent updates there have been some changes that I don‚Äôt like:
- Switching the info and caption buttons on videos. It could have been better to just have the info and captions buttons both at the top right together.
- Switching the notifications and upload buttons. My muscle memory is now completely messed up and it seems better to have the notifications button at the bottom instead of having to reach up at the top.
- Putting the description and comment sections into different pages. Having these just extend out like before was better as you wont have to close out of the description or comment section to like, dislike, share, etc. 

Lately, there have been many times when the app would just freeze or crash completely and it has been so frequent to the point where I am going insane.

I really used to love this app, but these changes and bugs have really annoyed me and i hope some of these could be resolved soon. Thanks!

title: Newest version introduced tons of bugs
text:
The recent update that changed how the UI looks introduced bugs which are severely ruining my experience with the app.

 I primarily would use this to Chromecast to another TV, and now since the update it seems that when I unlock my phone while it‚Äôs casting, the app has ‚Äúforgotten‚Äù about the TV I‚Äôm casting to. The cast icon still appears colored, but when I press it there is no information about the TV displayed, and pressing Disconnect does nothing. I‚Äôm not able to change what‚Äôs playing on the TV or reconnect to it unless I completely close out of the app and reopen it (thus losing where I was in the video as well as losing any other videos I had queued to play). This is pretty frustrating for me and I wish I could just revert to the old version since it was working fine before this unnecessary update.

title: Give BTS Their Views
text: Please give back BTS‚Äô views! ARMYs all around the world worked so hard and put so much time and effort into it just so you can take it away from them. BTS and ARMY don‚Äôt deserve this type of treatment. We‚Äôve put up with your policies about how to watch a video so it‚Äôll get its view and all your other stupid rules. But now you‚Äôve crossed the line! Deleting hard work and dedication and saying it‚Äôs ‚Äúbot views‚Äù is absolutely down right ridiculous! I hope you can realize your mistake and give us back our views. And I also hope you realize that ARMY will never stop watching and sooner or later we‚Äôll get the views back and add some.

title: Amazing app but one thing....
text: This is an amazing app and do use it almost of the time I have the chance to. I do my usual scroll through the list, looking at the videos until I find an eye catching one or one that I know I‚Äôll enjoy from the recommend list. I watch the video and get an ad. But the ad is one minute long, and UN SKIPPABLE. Most of the other ads are usually 30 seconds and skippable. But this one wasn‚Äôt. I don‚Äôt know if this changed with the terms and service and the policy but it isn‚Äôt much enjoyable. Also when the ads occur they are always the same one. Always the Facebook group or the one for medicine. Always the same one again and again.

title: View count system is confusing
text:
I understand that you have your rules and you need to control for bots watching videos, but I‚Äôve seen big fluctuations in view counts on high-trafficked videos. I think that there could be more accommodation for situations like BTS releasing a new music video, in which case large numbers of people are watching the video multiple times a day or even hour. 

If nothing else, it would be less confusing if the public view count didn‚Äôt update until the views were verified, so we don‚Äôt see a video going from 48 million to 43 million in minutes.

Also, if there are any changes in what is considered ‚Äúbot-like‚Äù behavior, we would appreciate knowing. As it is, fans were making coordinated efforts to watch the music video, watch 2-3 other videos for ~10 minutes, and then watch the music video again. If this is problematic in some way, we would like to know.

title: You tube review/rese√±a de you tube
text:
To Whom It May Concern:

You tube it‚Äôs an excellent platform to search, develop, learning and entertaining ourselves and the rest of the world. It‚Äôs a privilege to have such good tools so we can broadcast our own content and share it to everyone that can reach it, certainly I‚Äôve enjoy my favorite content in the platform for many years and become myself a content creator for the app in the past 7 months. The only complaint I have is the little exposure the micro channels have in the platform, that should improve urgently and so the recommendations the platform a.i. gives the little ones and newly added channels. 

Thanks..

title: My Childhood
text:
I have been using this app ever since I was a little kid watching my favorite you tubers every night and memorizing there uploud times and always just having a ball back in the 2000‚Äôs watching on my iPhone 4 it‚Äôs literally the best app ever and I use it everyday usually I absolutely adore this app and hope it continues to grow.

A cool new feature would be to have a tag to say if you have seen a video before one reason is if you scroll through your feed it will take a bit to find one by a specific YouTuber that you haven‚Äôt seen just by scrolling once on a vid (if you watch a lot) 
A solution would be to have like a red tag to notify you have already seen it

title: ITS OKAY BUT NOT GREAT
text: So basically I use this app all day because I have nothing else to do. But it‚Äôs okay, sometimes I‚Äôll be watching some videos and it would freeze not allowing me scroll down or press any videos. Which frustrates me because basically I get bored of the video I‚Äôm watching so I want to look for a new one. Also, recommendations are just random. I‚Äôll be watching a video about someone playing the Titanic song on a recorder and as soon I finish the video I go to recommendations there will be a video about how to become a actor from like two years ago üôÑ. Like seriously, give me newly made videos. Besides all of the cons, pros is all the new tea that‚Äôs coming out on drama channels üëçüèº

title: A new live/casting issue
text:
New: so now you‚Äôve fixed the issue where I couldn‚Äôt chat in live-streams while streaming to a TV but now when I try to stream videos that are using this (IMO stupid) new premier feature, it tells me it can‚Äôt be played because the streamer stopped streaming. I can watch and chat on my phone as usual but if I am streaming to a chrome cast i can‚Äôt play it until the premier is over and I am just watching the video alone (no chat.) why is this such an issue for you? Don‚Äôt you WANT us to chat so you can log all our opinions and interactions for use later in developing the algorithms that will be used to censor us? Yeah thought so. 

Old: Seriously?? Months now it has been since I‚Äôve been able to chat on my phone and cast to tv simultaneously for livestreams. This is stupid.

title: Great video sharing app
text: As with everything in life there are upsides and downsides. I love the ease of searching and finding videos of songs and content that the talented creators produce, however the censorship against conservative viewpoints and musicians producing amazing music that factually debunks msm narratives and talking points is a disgusting practice that should be done away with. If you are actually fighting disinformation I‚Äôd recommend that you put a ‚Äúwait 18 months to find the truth of the matter which is likely the exact opposite of this story‚Äù banner on everything posted by CNN, MSNBC, and other ‚Äúnews outlets‚Äù with a historical accuracy level below the national enquirer and the Babylon bee.

title: A few glitches that haven‚Äôt been fixed
text: In general, I really like the app, on my phone & iPad BUT there a couple of glitches that really bug me. 1-Sometimes for seemingly no reason, my screen will go black but I can hear the video playing in the background. 2-Sometimes while watching a video & scrolling down on my phone or if I am just picking the phone up, the screen flips to an open Google search page (Google wasn‚Äôt running in the background on my phone.).  I don‚Äôt know where to report these annoyances so stating them here. These are happening on my iPhone 12pro max, 520 Gig storage running most recent updates - it‚Äôs been happening for several iOS versions now.

title: Utube followerer
text:
UTUBE provides a platform for music, comedy, news, health and I just discovered it in 2018. I‚Äôm late to the class and I derive so much pleasure from what UTUBE offers, including making trolls that attack your personal comments, accountable. 

I have my favorite channel, voice lessons, Mark Baxter that generously gives his genius and time to all of us beginners up to performing artists. His humanity bridges music with helping those of us that have had PTSD struggles and other struggles, I don‚Äôt know about, yet I‚Äôm confident whomever reaches out to him, he takes the time to connect. He is that kind of humanitarian artist. 
Thank you UTUBE, from my heart for creating this superb media.

title: Reconsider‚Ä¶..
text:
I think that You Tube is a great idea.  I appreciate all that it has made available to me. 
I just don‚Äôt understand its censorship.  You can allow the most vile singing and dancing, or radical ideas‚Ä¶..but when it comes to conservative and/or Christian ideas and people, you kick them off!  These people mostly have ideas that America was built upon.  

These days, people cry out for equity, but you eliminate the conservatives.  I think that someday soon you will need to reconsider your operations, because Jesus Christ is going to be revealed to the earth in a huge way, and so you need to repent now while you still have time to. 

I say this with love.  A doctor has love for a patient when he tells him that he has cancer.  I am speaking love to you that your company has cancer as it silences Christians.  Change your thinking, and God will forgive and honor you.  Follow Him and you will experience peace and joy. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Whomever is reading this, I ask that you restore Julie Greene.  And also, you might want to watch Joseph Prince or Andrew Wommack, to learn of salvation which will be your most wonderful path.  
God bless.

title: Major Flaw with App!!! Please FIX!!!
text: There is a serious problem with this app. The problem is that an entire saved playlist that you make can disappear. It doesn‚Äôt matter what iOS version you have or what iphone model you have. It‚Äôs happened on all my iPhones over the years. It is something that‚Äôs been an issue for years. I do have several playlists like over 40 playlists so I don‚Äôt know if the issue only happens on people with several playlists or if it can also happen on someone with only a few playlists. But that‚Äôs something your IT department can look into and fix. It‚Äôs very annoying when your entire playlist that you made all of a sudden disappears and you can‚Äôt watch your saved videos or get it back. Also it can be more than one playlist that disappears at a time. Once you fix this bug I will rate 5 stars.

title: You‚Äôre google. Do better. Or don‚Äôt but I‚Äôm surprised at the lack of quality coming from y‚Äôall.
text: Coming from a tech background I‚Äôm surprised this made it through QA or any sort of design review at a company the scale of google, stop resting and vesting and make a good app please ü•∫ - Why on earth can I not swipe down to dismiss a video? - Navigating after video is confusing, hard when ALL you have to do is take me back to the video screen PLEASE. - This is the best your ranking model can do? - why do I get 2 relevant items to my search before I get the ‚ÄúOH HEY TOTALLY IRRELEVANT BUT LOOK AT THIS VIDEOS‚Äù thing? And hey maybe don‚Äôt let the reviewers give you roadmap items we‚Äôll see in a couple years! But for real get an experienced UX designer to look at this because its horrible to use. From a smaller company sure, but this makes me laugh at what approvals must look like at google if this can get approved.
